alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Livingston Area (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 20 at 2:47PM MST until December 22 at 12:00PM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds with gusts up to 65 mph expected. Blowing snow may produce near whiteout conditions at times this evening. * WHERE...Livingston Area and Beartooth Foothills. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to noon MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make travel difficult. Drivers of high profile vehicles should use extra caution... particularly along portions of Interstate 90 from Springdale to Livingston. Very strong cross winds are expected in these areas. Blowing snow may drop visibility below a mile at times, and cause slick road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds are expected tonight, and then again on Tuesday night. During the day Tuesday wind gusts will diminish to 40 to 50 mph. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at http://www.weather.gov/billings
